name: In / Out
description:
In a world where no freedom exists, where kingdoms didn't turn into democracies,but became dictatorships,in a world where political leaders do as they wish,a rebel group fights for freedom.

Help them sneak trough TV and radio stations so they can spread the truth and create riots all around the world.

Play trough unique procedurally-generated maps and liberate the people in the Campaign mode, or play as long as you can in the upcoming Endless mode.

Join us now!
